1.0.0.name: wordpress/social-bar
1.0.0.description:
Plugin lets you to display Facebook, Twitter, G-Plus and LinkedIn bar as widget on sidebar with the themes that supports sidebar or Footer

It is very light weight and doesn't use too many javascript codes, just gives user options to Follow Share using Endpoint.

Note: Demo of the widget http://ujwolbastakoti.info
